line_1: The vain conceits of the presumptuous Wights:
line_2: For Pity's-sake at last I'll set at rights

line_1: Hear now th' instructive Song, ye thoughtless Wights,
line_2: Wedded to Sense, and fixt on mean Delights.

line_1: Stiff in opinion, active, restless wights,
line_2: They rise against the wind like paper kites:
